Telegram Bots Manager.descrition: Webhook to deploy a lightweight, scalable and inexpensive infrastructure for the development and management of multiple Telegram bots.
detail: Use of the AWS Chalice library to set up a WEB infrastructure using AWS Lambda and AWS Api-Gateway
Creation of a bot interface to simplify and personalize global handling of Telegram bots
Creation of various example bosts using different APIs. (Openwheatermap, CoinmarketCap, Open-ai, Web3.py).
Implementation of github CI/CD workflows to improve continuous development (linting, testing) and automate deployment.

Etherum Block Explorer.descrition: Web3 application for exploring the Ethereum blockchain and interacting with external wallet MetaMask.
detail: Development of a Web application using the Python Flask library.
Integration of the web3.py library to facilitate querying the Ethereum blockchain via Infura as the provider.
Development of JavaScript functions to enable interaction with blockchain wallet extensions in the browser, such as MetaMask.
Implementation of various features including block exploration, Ethereum transactions, and the capability to connect to a MetaMask wallet and send Ether.
